backend/main.mo: Main IC canister actor handling user profiles, invite codes, access control, vehicle records, notifications, and admin-allowlist logic via authorization and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, descriptions, related frontend files, components, and test IDs for recent admin-onboarding and routing changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing various frontend components, hooks, pages, and infrastructure utilities across the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting metadata, PWA manifest links, icons, and loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining name, colors, icons, categories, and startup behavior for the Pasar Digital Community app.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first and network-first strategies with explicit non-cacheable assets and versioned cache cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing configuration using TanStack Router, with I18nProvider, ThemeProvider, and route definitions for all major pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message and allows eligible users to claim first admin privileges by submitting profile info.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Shows detailed profile loading errors, categorized causes, and provides error copy and retry options.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Presents a branded login screen enabling users to sign in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupBoot: Displays startup initialization errors with troubleshooting steps and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Renders the application logo at configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Provides a dropdown to switch between available interface languages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps pages with authenticated header, footer, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog for reporting a vehicle as lost with a required note and mutation call.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog for submitting a found vehicle report tied to a specific vehicle.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Renders the main navigation header with user menu, language switcher, and conditional admin links based on admin status.
frontend/src/components/system/TopLevelE: Catches top-level rendering errors and displays a fallback UI instead of crashing.
Displays an error screen with troubleshooting steps and a reload button when the app hits a critical error.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Handles initiating a vehicle transfer, prompting for PIN and showing the generated transfer code with copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: A dialog that collects and submits a PIN with error handling and loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance tied to identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrapStat: Provides loading and error status for actor initialization with a retry mechanism that clears and refreshes the actor query.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides hooks for checking admin status, onboarding first admin, and fetching admin-only data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Hooks for querying lost vehicles and marking vehicles lost or found, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Hooks for fetching user notifications with polling and marking notifications as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Mutation hook to complete user onboarding and refresh the current user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Hooks for setting up and updating a user's PIN via actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the callerâ€™s user profile, keyed by the current identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Hooks to initiate and accept vehicle transfers and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Hooks for fetching user vehicles, fetching a specific vehicle, and registering new vehicles.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Implements a lightweight i18n system with language registration, translation lookup, and listeners.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides an i18n context for managing language state, translations, and available languages.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/ar.ts: Arabic language pack defining translations and RTL settings.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/en.ts: Provides English language translations for navigation, dashboard, vehicle management, and authentication UI text.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/id.ts: Provides Indonesian translations for the application's UI, mirroring keys used across navigation, dashboard, and vehicle flows.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/zh-Hans.ts: Contains Simplified Chinese translations for all major UI elements including dashboard, vehicles, and registration screens.
frontend/src/i18n/storage.ts: Handles saving and loading the selected language code using localStorage with error safety.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes, including color tokens and layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page describing the platform, its features, and provides admin contact information.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Implements a form for users to enter and submit a vehicle transfer code, handling validation and transfer acceptance.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin-only dashboard showing system statistics and handling admin access verification.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin interface for generating, listing, and managing invite tokens with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing user vehicle stats, lost vehicle reports, and unread notifications with quick navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Lists reported lost vehicles with search and filtering, displaying details and allowing found reports.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays user notifications with timestamps and allows marking them as read.
Handles invite-based onboarding form submission and redirects admins away from the page.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and edits user profile information with support for updating and logging out.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Form for registering a new vehicle, including photo upload with progress and submission handling.
Provides UI and logic for creating and updating a security PIN with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific vehicle, including status, photo, metadata, and owner actions.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Lists the user's registered vehicles with status badges and navigation to vehicle registration or detail pages.
frontend/src/routes/RootRouteGate.tsx: Handles authentication, profile/admin loading, onboarding redirects, and actor bootstrap errors before rendering the main app layout.
frontend/src/utils/actorProxy.ts: Wraps backend actors to safely handle admin secret initialization and prevent startup failures from invalid tokens.
frontend/src/utils/actorQueryKey.ts: Generates a stable React Query key for actor-related queries based on identity.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Provides a client-side allowlist of admin principals and helpers to check or retrieve them.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapError.ts: Classifies bootstrap errors, extracts technical details, and formats them for display or copying.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, known issues, admin allowlist needs, and feature requests related to onboarding and authorization.
